channel.title: Piety-Pk 317 | New Server | Need Staff | 24/7 Online
channel.description:
[b][align=center]Hey guys welcome to Piety-Pk a new server searching for players & staff members!
Here is some media of piety-pk
Currently working on the new website! which isn't going to be setup by webs :rolleyes:
[size=18]Go to www.Piety-Pk.webs.c o m (Remove spaces) [/size]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dirbLxiEW1w&feature=c4-overview&list=UU_Cij1XyY85PBkxm8zUe_dA[/youtube]
i have been working on this project for the last couple of weeks and many mates and asked me to release this to the online world! Piety-Pk is a much loved project now going to be hosted online for you players to enjoy feel free to go to the website and use the webclient or client download to enjoy your gameplay!
We are only currently hosting the website on a .webs temp for players to use until we have created a real html & css website.
here are some of the features we have in pietypk
A Agility Shop with interfaces for tickets. Working Banktabs Summoning quest to level up summoning Working Auras in-game Fixing Minigames Eco Recoding Better Combat Full Screen Client Audio Sounds Temp Staff Working MoneyPouch! dupe in the MoneyPouch Drop Dupe Summoning Orb With Draining Fixed Cheat Egine Dupe! custom items with 711 model header [Server] Announcement when you get 99 LevelPoints with a Store custom GFX and Anime for some basic commands Lottery, [Lottie] Disabled Shops for Users That Can Spawn Staff or players who can spawn can not attend in the lottery Added 2 Starters Per Ip Added Custom Log-ins when Staff Log in Fixed Total Level Donators need Donor points to use their Shops not cash[Makes it so reg players cant be teled there and buy the items] Vote4Cash Voting System with SOF Spins on claim 100% Timed mute 100% Timed Ban Smithing (x5, x10) 120 Dungeoneering The Arrow Dupe Glitch Server AutoSave Lag when banking all Player Titles Auto-Server Save UIDs (i disabled, ease to re-enable) SOF InterFace KillStreak Point System Made KS give you extra PK Points Re-Wrote Mage (Was totally messed up on v1) Custom Npc Shops Added in dice command for Donator+ New Interfaces Fixed Crowns in Pc, Pm, and chat Admins and Owners dont share same crowns Comp Cape requireing all 99s. Zoom in and Zoom out feature New Superdonator Extreme Donator Rank Better Duel Arena New ::Help method Better Prayer Better Eco Vote point shop Tokkul Shop 2b Ticket Exchange New member rank timedmute timedban SollyStore Nice Player ritles With a good Interface Player Titles for most ranks Player Cliping Summoning Working Fixed Charms Better Spirit Shields (Not showing lines like regualr ones) Staff Tab saying if staff is online or not. Most Sinlge and Double doors working the way they need to Awesome Donator Benifits Made a lot of things Fixed Freezing in Wise old man New staff capes And LOADS OF MORE THINGS!
i have spent as much time as possible on this server! updating and working on this server i am currently building my website as soon as finished it will be uploaded to a webhosting company and a domain will be bought! we are here for good![/align][/b]

item.title: Piety-Pk 317 | New Server | Need Staff | 24/7 Online
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

nolan2131:

Make it unique, make it your own, something that sticks out and makes people want to come check it out. Add your own content.

sounds like a great idea like move homes - add extra shops - diff icons - etc i will give that a go mate.

Read full topic

item.title: Piety-Pk 317 | New Server | Need Staff | 24/7 Online
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

[b][align=center]Hey guys welcome to Piety-Pk a new server searching for players & staff members!

Here is some media of piety-pk

Currently working on the new website! which isnâ€™t going to be setup by webs :rolleyes:

[size=18]Go to www.Piety-Pk.webs.c o m (Remove spaces) [/size]

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dirbLxiEW1w&feature=c4-overview&list=UU_Cij1XyY85PBkxm8zUe_dA[/youtube]

i have been working on this project for the last couple of weeks and many mates and asked me to release this to the online world!
Piety-Pk is a much loved project now going to be hosted online for you players to enjoy feel free to go to the website and use the webclient or client download to enjoy your gameplay!

We are only currently hosting the website on a .webs temp for players to use until we have created a real html & css website.

here are some of the features we have in pietypk

A Agility Shop with interfaces for tickets.
Working Banktabs
Summoning quest to level up summoning
Working Auras in-game
Fixing Minigames
Eco Recoding
Better Combat
Full Screen Client
Audio Sounds
Temp Staff
Working MoneyPouch!
dupe in the MoneyPouch
Drop Dupe
Summoning Orb With Draining
Fixed Cheat Egine Dupe!
custom items with 711 model header
[Server] Announcement when you get 99
LevelPoints with a Store
custom GFX and Anime for some basic commands
Lottery, [Lottie]
Disabled Shops for Users That Can Spawn
Staff or players who can spawn can not attend in the lottery
Added 2 Starters Per Ip
Added Custom Log-ins when Staff Log in
Fixed Total Level
Donators need Donor points to use their Shops not cash[Makes it so reg players cant be teled there and buy the items]
Vote4Cash Voting System with SOF Spins on claim
100% Timed mute
100% Timed Ban
Smithing (x5, x10)
120 Dungeoneering
The Arrow Dupe Glitch
Server AutoSave
Lag when banking all
Player Titles
Auto-Server Save
UIDs (i disabled, ease to re-enable)
SOF InterFace
KillStreak Point System
Made KS give you extra PK Points
Re-Wrote Mage (Was totally messed up on v1)
Custom Npc Shops
Added in dice command for Donator+
New Interfaces
Fixed Crowns in Pc, Pm, and chat
Admins and Owners dont share same crowns
Comp Cape requireing all 99s.
Zoom in and Zoom out feature
New Superdonator Extreme Donator Rank
Better Duel Arena
New ::Help method
Better Prayer
Better Eco
Vote point shop
Tokkul Shop
2b Ticket Exchange
New member rank
timedmute
timedban
SollyStore
Nice Player ritles With a good Interface
Player Titles for most ranks
Player Cliping
Summoning Working
Fixed Charms
Better Spirit Shields (Not showing lines like regualr ones)
Staff Tab saying if staff is online or not.
Most Sinlge and Double doors working the way they need to
Awesome Donator Benifits
Made a lot of things
Fixed Freezing in Wise old man
New staff capes
And LOADS OF MORE THINGS!

i have spent as much time as possible on this server! updating and working on this server i am currently building my website as soon as finished it will be uploaded to a webhosting company and a domain will be bought! we are here for good![/align][/b]
